completion: Some common ones are mindful breathing, body scan, and mindful eating. Would you like me to guide you through one?
Some nonreactivity exercises that I'm good at are leaves on the stream, ball in the pool, and sensory awanress. Would you like to practice one with me?
Some reappraisal exercises that I can tell you more about are loving-kindness, gratitude, and yes to life. Would you like to practice one with me?
